TRACX is the new MYLAPS EventApp platform. With TRACX we deliver every athlete and fan the best event experience. TRACX is the event community for athletes who challenge themselves during the greatest sport events around the world. Are you ready for the next event? Find your next event, track your performances and go for the full event experience. Ready? Set. GO!

Important functionalities for the athlete:

- View all event information
- Get the latest event updates
- Share your live location during the event with friends and family
- View your performance in the rankings
- Compare your times and results
- Share your performance and finish selfie with others

Important functionalities for fans:

- Follow your friends and family during live events
- Get the latest event updates
- Activate notifications to receive the latest updates from your favourite athlete

Profile

Create your own lifetime event profile, which can be used for all TRACX events. You can compare your own past performances, set new goals and build up your own fan base. Want to share your participation and achievements with others? The QR-code makes it very easy to share your results with family and friends.

Timeline

On the timeline you will be informed about the latest updates and relevant information about the event. Here you get to see the athletes you want to follow, there is a countdown to the event, you get shortcuts to interesting widgets and you get updates about your favorite athlete.

Explore

Discover all the cool features. Here you can live follow the performance of your favourite athlete, see the race programme and find out what the route of the race looks like.

Live tracking

With the LiveTracking feature you will not miss a thing during the event. You can see exactly where your favourite athlete is running, how many kilometres has been covered, how many kilometers to go, the expected finish time and his or her current position in the rankings. 

Rankings

The rankings can be filtered on different variables. During the event you can follow the live rankings and after the race you can search and compare in the official race results.

Upcoming events
